data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Porto Novo, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Porto Novo, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,422 believers in Porto Novo to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Porto Novo to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 15,579 people in Porto Novo who are far from you. Please add 3 new house churches this year.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Porto Novo
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Porto Novo, Porto Novo, Cape Verde.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Porto Novo, Cape Verde, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Porto Novo.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Porto Novo, Cape Verde has a population of 17,000.

We estimate Porto Novo has 1,422 people who might know Jesus, 13,191 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,388 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Porto Novo, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
